testcase.name: Check the service DELETE method
testcase.system-out: * url url ................................................................. passed * def responseDeletePet = read('classpath:karate/EP4_DeletePet/SuccessfulDeleteResponse.json') . passed Given path 'pet', '15' .................................................... passed And header api_key = "special-key" ........................................ passed When method delete ........................................................ passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response == responseDeletePet ................................... passed And assert response.type == responseDeletePet.type ........................ passed And assert response.message == '15' ....................................... passed
